comments.body:
We can sensibly incorporate `ExecutionContextExecutor` in this scheme by writing

```scala
  type T[+P, +A] <: A
```

and defining aliases accordingly. It would then be a little closer to `scalaz.Tag`, albeit with subtyping, as well.  I'm not sure support for such subtypes is needed, though.

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+package com.daml.scalautil.concurrent
+
+import scala.language.higherKinds
+import scala.{concurrent => sc}
+
+sealed abstract class ExecutionContextOf {
+  type T[+P] <: sc.ExecutionContext
